## BlockFlyoutInflater class

Class responsible for creating blocks for flyouts.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BlockFlyoutInflater implements IFlyoutInflater 
```
**Implements:** [IFlyoutInflater](./blockly.iflyoutinflater.md)

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addBlockListeners(block)](./blockly.blockflyoutinflater.addblocklisteners.md) | <code>protected</code> | Add listeners to a block that has been added to the flyout. |

|  [load(state, flyout)](./blockly.blockflyoutinflater.load.md) |  | Inflates a flyout block from the given state and adds it to the flyout. |
|  [removeListeners(blockId)](./blockly.blockflyoutinflater.removelisteners.md) | <code>protected</code> | Removes event listeners for the block with the given ID. |
